title: Phone Cameras vs. 'Real' Cameras: Which Is Right for You?
description: A guide to three phones with excellent cameras, plus some old-school rivals—from a DSLR to an instant camera

title: Join the Debate: We All Have Smartphones, But Do You Need a 'Real' Camera, Too?
description: Fans of Mirrorless, point-and-shoot and instant cameras say they’re fun to use and take superlative shots. Skeptics say better cameras on phones have made anything else totally unnecessary.

title: Amazon CEO Andy Jassy Commits to Cost-Cutting, Tech Investments in Shareholder Letter
description: Amazon.com faced one of its “harder macroeconomic years in recent memory,” Chief Executive Andy Jassy said in a letter to shareholders.

title: Amazon Joins Microsoft, Google in AI Race Spurred by ChatGPT
description: Amazon Web Services is the latest tech company to lay out its generative AI strategy.

title: Google to Ask Judge to End DOJ Antitrust Case
description: A district judge will hear arguments in a landmark case over search-engine dominance.

title: TikTok Parent ByteDance Battles Meta For Virtual-Reality App Developers
description: ByteDance is offering to pay software makers to bring apps to its VR device, while Meta sees friction over its app-store approvals.
